name: SmartIntec
0:
”Alexa, turn on light”
”Alexa, turn off light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
If you have any problems when using this skill, you can contact us by email: feedback@tuyasmart.me
You can simply ask Alexa to turn the light intensity on, off or down.
It is not necessary to switch to the switch to adjust the home light: just talk to Alexa on Amazon Echo, Echo Dot, Amazon Tap or Echo Show.
After connecting Alexa to your "Smart Intec" products in a few simple steps:
(1). Download our "Smart Intec" app in the store: Android or iOS;
(2). Register a "Smart Intec" account in our "Smart Intec" app;
(3). You must have "Smart Intec" devices to do this
(4). Configure these devices in our "Smart Intec" app and change the appropriate name for your devices that will be used in the "Smart Intec" skills
(5). Download the Amazon "Alexa" app from: Android, iOS or Amazon app Market;
(6). Configure Echo with the "Alexa" app;
(7). Look for the "Smart Intec" skill in the "Alexa" app's skill category;
(8). Click on the "Smart Intec" skill and you will be directed to the "Smart Intec" login page
(9). Enter the username and password of your "Smart Intec" account, you will be redirected to the success page;
(10). Now the whole installation is complete.
You can enjoy voice control on your home devices like these skills:
"Alexa, turn on the kitchen light"
"Alexa, turn off the kitchen light"
"Alexa, turn down the living room light"
"Alexa, turn down the living room light"
"Alexa, set the living room light to 20%"
"Alexa, set the bedroom light to Blue"

Currently this skill supports all products: "Smart Intec"
